name: Hunter Gatherer
description: Hunter Gatherer is a top down adventure in which you are found, lost in the woods, by a forest spirit. He has a passion for cooking and will point you in the direction of your home town if you help him find some ingredients.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / XP / 7 / 8 Processor: 1 GHZ Memory: 100 MB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It has to be worth the sale price of $1.69 right? No. The concept is worthy, but there is no content to back it up. Would revisit if there was more added.
this game is great if you hate fun.
